hero.title: Gaming Equipment Expert: Repair, Maintenance, Software
hero.subtitle: Reliable solutions for seamless operation of your business.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Over 10 years of trusted expertise in the gaming industry.
about.text1: With over a decade of dedicated experience, I specialize in the diagnosis, repair, and maintenance of a wide range of gaming equipment. My focus is on ensuring the highest standards of reliability and confidentiality, critical for sensitive operations.
about.text2: I provide comprehensive technical support to small gaming clubs, private machine owners, and large casinos across Europe, strictly adhering to all relevant gaming regulations and standards. My commitment is to operational excellence and minimizing downtime for your business.
about.highlight1: Certified Technician with extensive industry knowledge.
about.highlight2: Strict confidentiality and data security protocols.

services.title: My Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive technical solutions for all your gaming equipment needs.

diagnostic.title: Diagnosis & Complex Repair
diagnostic.text: Expert diagnosis and repair of electronic components, mechanical assemblies, and peripherals (bill validators, printers).

firmware.title: Firmware & Software Updates
firmware.text: Parameter modification, error correction, and installation of new software. All work ensures legality and compliance with regulations.

maintenance.title: Preventative Maintenance
maintenance.text: Thorough cleaning, lubrication, testing, and proactive prevention of malfunctions to ensure continuous operation.

installation.title: Equipment Installation & Setup
installation.text: Professional connection, calibration, and commissioning of new gaming equipment.

consultation.title: Expert Consultation
consultation.text: Assistance in equipment selection, operational optimization, and technical guidance for your gaming business.

equipment.title: Technologies & Brands I Work With
equipment.subtitle: Extensive expertise across leading manufacturers and industry standards.

whyMe.title: Why Choose My Services?
whyMe.subtitle: Unwavering commitment to quality, trust, and efficiency.

advantage1.title: Proven Expertise & Qualification
advantage1.text: Years of hands-on experience and continuous training ensure that I am always up-to-date with the latest technologies and industry best practices.

advantage2.title: Reliability & Confidentiality
advantage2.text: I guarantee the utmost discretion and data security when handling your sensitive equipment and information. Your trust is my priority.

advantage3.title: Prompt Responsiveness
advantage3.text: Fast and efficient response to all service requests, minimizing downtime and ensuring your operations run smoothly.

advantage4.title: Full Legal Compliance
advantage4.text: All services are conducted strictly within the framework of European gaming legislation and industry regulations.

advantage5.title: Personalized Approach
advantage5.text: Tailored solutions that are specifically adapted to meet the unique needs and challenges of your business.
